    Society for Mathematical Biology Annual Meeting - 2025

    Edmonton, Canada







    Edmonton Convention Center

    July 13-18, 2025

    The University of Alberta is eager to invite you to participate in the Annual Meeting of the Society for Mathematical Biology in the summer of 2025. Located in the northernmost metropolis in North America, the city of Edmonton will make a beautiful location for SMB 2025. Edmonton International Airport (YEG) offers non-stop flights from more than 50 major cities in Canada, the United States, and international destinations.






    Organizers
    • Jay Newby, University of Alberta
    • Hao Wang, University of Alberta

    We wish to acknowledge that we are located within Treaty 6 territory and Metis Nation of Alberta Region 4. We acknowledge this land as the traditional home for many Indigenous Peoples including the Cree, Blackfoot, Metis, Nakota Sioux, Dene, Saulteaux, Anishinaabe, Inuit and many others whose histories, languages, and cultures continue to influence our vibrant community.
